[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 Army token if you don't control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on a Army you control.)[/i]
When Settling of Nizev enters, look at the top four cards of an
opponent's library, exile two of them, and put the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order. You may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.
